pullrequest.title: Install cmake files to share instead of lib

content.raw:
One thing we need to be cautious of is that we'll need to have `share/ignition-cmake1/ignition-cmake1-config.cmake` rather than `share/ignition/ignition-cmake1/ignition-cmake1-config.cmake` so that cmake can find the project's config-file.

That makes me wonder if `IGN_DATAROOT_INSTALL_DIR_FULL` should be `share/ignition-cmake1/` instead of `share/ignition/ignition-cmake1`.
